home.title: Barkio: Dog Monitor for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows
home.description: Barkio turns your two devices into a single dog monitoring app. Watch live video of your dog, hear every bark, and interact remotely.
home.ogdescription: Barkio is a new generation of the dog monitoring app. Watch, hear, and communicate with your dog remotely. Try it for free on Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows.
home.ogtitle: Barkio is a new generation of the dog monitoring app. Watch, hear, and communicate with your dog remotely. Try it for free on Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows.
header.h1: Your dog will never feel lonely at home on its own
header.h2: Meet a new generation of pet monitoring apps for your dogs and puppies. Try it for free.
modalplatforms.txt: Open this website on a particular device to download the app on that platform.
modalplatforms.txtlg: Barkio is a available for many operation systems like Android, iOS, macOS, Windows and Linux. Choose yours and never lose contact with your dog.
reasons.h3: Find out why Barkio is the best dog and pet monitoring app.
reasons.separation.txt1: If your dog is barking, howling, or whining when it's home alone, it may indicate
reasons.separation.txta: signs of separation anxiety in dogs
reasons.separation.txt2: Barkio pet monitor lets you watch a video of your puppy in real-time and communicate remotely.
reasons.watch.txt: Check on your puppy with Barkio pet cam. Monitoring your pup gives you a peace of mind knowing your pet is okay. Barkio is also handy when helping your dog settle in a new home.
reasons.track.txt: Is your dog barking, howling, running around, or sleeping in its bed? Barkio gives you an overview of all activities, so you can better understand your dog's behavior.
reasons.nohw.txt: With Barkio app, you can turn your old phones, tablets, or laptops into a pet camera. No need for overpriced cameras, dog treat dispensers, or collars.
features.h3: Check your pet from anywhere and at any time.
features.hd.txt: Watch your pet remotely with live HD video. With a 2-way video option, you will see your dog, and your pet will see you as well.
features.talk.txt: Hear if your dog barks or whines, calm your pet remotely, and record your own dog commands (voice messages).
features.check.txt: Barkio gives you an overview of all activities your pup has been up to. Replay captured noises to find out if your dog is anxious or if everything's alright.
features.invite.txt: All pet parents in your family can join the monitoring and check on your dog or puppy.
features.reach.txt: With WiFi and cellular data, you can check on your dog or puppy from anywhere. The distance between you and your pet is unlimited.
features.choose.txt: Security and reliability are our highest priorities. The whole communication is encrypted by industry-standard SSL. We'll notify you about your dog when anything happens.
features.banner.txt: Staying in touch with your dog has never been easier.
newsletter.txt: Receive pet parent tips, special offers, and photos of cute puppies right into your inbox.
newsletter.success: Thanks! ❤️ Check your inbox and confirm your email address.
newsletter.error: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred. Please refresh the page and try it again later.
testimonials.first.txt: “Love it! My partner and I connect to check on our puppy when we go out to see what she's up to. Works flawlessly, plus costs a fraction compared to dog cameras. Recommend!“
testimonials.second.txt: “Barkio helped me with training my fostered dog to feel comfortable and calm when I leave for an hour or two and gives me peace of mind. Barkio is a must for any dog owner.“
testimonials.third.txt: “My neighbor complained about my dog Trixie howling and barking whenever I left. Barkio helped me to watch video of Trixie when I'm not there. Turned out, she wasn't barking at all!“
footer.trybanner.txt: Never leave your dog alone again. Get started for free.
comparisonpage.h2: Find out what dog monitoring app is best for you.
comparisonpage.4download.dm: Pay upfront with no free trial
downpages.download.h2: Barkio is available on multiple platforms. Choose yours and download Barkio for free.
downpages.download.1txt: Available on macOS, Windows, and Linux.
downpages.download.2txt: Available on iOS and Android devices.
downpages.downloadthx.h2: Stay in touch and join our Barkio online community. You won't miss out on any pawesome news!
cookies.sentence: By using this site, you agree with
pricing.h1: Choose the right plan for you
pricing.unlimited: Get unlimited monitoring time across all devices
pricing.access: Access premium on iOS, Android, and desktop
pricing.replay: Replay audio recordings from up to 21 days
pricing.explainer: *Free trial is available only to new subscribers
pricing.howToActivate: To activate the unlimited version on your <1>mobile</1> and <2>desktop app</2>, log in with your Barkio account.
pricing.enjoy: You can now enjoy unlimited monitoring of your dog from your devices across all platforms.
